column1:
{"bio": "British writer Nicola Williams has authored more than 30 guidebooks for the Australian global travel publisher (majority-owned by BBC Worldwide); writes features and reviews for lonelyplanet.com and bbc.com/travel; and consults on various editorial projects in LP’s London and Melbourne offices. 
([source][1])


  [1]: https://tripalong.wordpress.com/short-cv/"
column5: "title": "Tripalong || Travel with a skip in its step (official web site)"}
